timeline.bodyText: What happens if the size is outside the range? Do you get an exception on persistence?
timeline.author: luciano-fiandesio
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -525,6 +532,20 @@ public void setLegendSet( LegendSet legendSet )
         this.legendSet = legendSet;
     }
 
+    @JsonProperty
+    @JsonSerialize( as = BaseIdentifiableObject.class )
+    @JacksonXmlProperty( namespace = DxfNamespaces.DXF_2_0 )
+    @PropertyRange( min = 7, max = 7 )
+    public String getNoDataColor()

replies.bodyText: We have built-in validation in the metadata importer linked to the @PropertyRange annotation. So you will get an import conflict from the JSON API endpoint.
replies.author: larshelge
